results.name: Triangle of asymmetric mobiles (circular rooted trees) with n nodes and k leaves.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275 (first 50 rows)
Index entries for sequences related to mobiles
formula: G.f. satisfies A(x, y) = x*(y - Sum_{i>0} moebius(i)/i * log(1 - A(x^i, y^i))). - _Michael Somos_, Aug 19 2015
Sum_k T(n, k) = A032171(n). - _Michael Somos_, Aug 24 2015
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := Module[{A}, A[_, _] = 0; If[k<1 || k>n, 0, For[j=1, j <= n, j++, A[x_, y_] = x*y-x*Sum[MoebiusMu[i]/i * Log[1 - A[x^i, y^i]] + O[x]^j // Normal, {i, 1, j}]]; Coefficient[Coefficient[A[x, y], x, n], y, k]]];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 1, 13}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 30 2017, after _Michael Somos_ *)
program: (PARI) {T(n, k) = my(A = O(x)); if(k<1 || k>n, 0, for(j=1, n, A = x*y - x*sum(i=1, j, moebius(i)/i * log(1 - subst( subst( A + x * O(x^min(j, n\i)), x, x^i), y, y^i) ) )); polcoeff( polcoeff(A, n), k))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Aug 24 2015 */
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, May 15 2000
